extension.news: v1.0.0 - Language support - Improve performance - Support https://github.com/MarkusEh/vdr-plugin-tvscraper - Improve support of KODI libraries - Add plugin icon and screenshots v0.4.0 - Support KODI 19, and stop support of KODI 18 v0.3.6 - Recordings are now listed in the same hierarchy as VDR v0.3.5 - add container refresh command v0.3.4 - fix move videos with xbmcvfs v0.3.3 - ignore missing index files (now also working with xbmcvfs) v0.3.2 - if the recording folder (*.rec) has an invalid format, the recording is still displayed with date 1960-01-01, 0:00:00. There will be an error message in the log v0.3.1 - typo in vdrrecordingfolder.py: fixed xbmcvfs.exist -> xbmcvfs.exists v0.3.0 - support xbmcvfs v0.2.4 - ignore missing index files v0.2.3 - change: Delete now permanently deletes a recording. There is a confirmation popup - new: Move of recordings v0.2.2 - support nun-integer framerates - support marks.txt v0.2.1 - Also support marks.vdr v0.2.0 - Support marks, create comskip file v0.1.3 - Movies: Support year v0.1.2 - TV shows: To aviod issue with KODI scrapper, TV shows are now flat (no subfolders). - Add search entry in context menu v0.1.1 - Added support for KODI libraries
extension.description: Si utilitzes Klaus Schmidingers VDR http://www.tvdr.de per crear gravacions de TV, podeu utilitzar aquest connector per veure-les a KODI.[CR]Necessiteu accedir al sistema de fitxers on s'emmagatzemen les gravacions VDR, per exemple, utilitzant NFS. No cal executar un VDR durant la reproducció de les gravacions amb aquest connector.

Hvis du bruger Klaus Schmidingers VDR (http://www.tvdr.de) for at oprette tv -optagelser, kan du bruge dette plugin til at se dem i Kodi.[CR]Du har brug for adgang til filsystemet, hvor VDR -optagelserne er gemt, f.eks. gennem NFS. En kørende VDR er ikke påkrævet under afspilning af optagelserne med dette plugin.

Abspielen von TV Aufzeichnungen, die mit Klaus Schmidingers VDR http://www.tvdr.de erstellt wurden. [CR]Voraussetzung: KODI benötigt Zugriff auf das Dateisystem mit den Aufzeichnungen, z.B. über NFS. Zur Wiedergabe der Aufzeichnungen mit diesem Plugin wird VDR nicht benötigt.

If you use Klaus Schmidingers VDR http://www.tvdr.de to create TV recorings, you can use this plugin to watch them in KODI.[CR]You do need access to the file system where the VDR recordings are stored, e.g. using NFS. A running VDR is not required during playback of the recordings with this plugin.

Se utilizzi Klaus Schmidingers VDR http://www.tvdr.de per creare registrazioni TV, puoi utilizzare questo plugin per guardarle in KODI.[CR]È necessario accedere al file system in cui sono archiviate le registrazioni VDR, ad es. usando NFS. Non è necessario un VDR in esecuzione durante la riproduzione delle registrazioni con questo plugin.

Jeśli używasz VDR http://www.tvdr.de Klausa Schmidingera do tworzenia nagrań telewizyjnych, możesz użyć tej wtyczki, aby oglądać je w KODI.[CR]Potrzebujesz dostępu do systemu plików, w którym przechowywane są nagrania VDR, np. za pomocą NFS. Działający VDR nie jest wymagany podczas odtwarzania nagrań za pomocą tej wtyczki.
